title: Dog oozing with the blood from the eye
selftext: I saw this dog in rangehills pune area. His eye is oozing with blood. I tried to feed him and thankfully he ate it. I had a word with vet and now I'm taking him to the hospital for the treatment. I'll need an ambulance or pet taxi to take him to the hospital. Ambulance is charging 1500. Since I'm student, its quite expensive for me. Can anyone assist taking him to the hospital?
comments: While i cant help in any way but hope someone else help u here but should've put the pic as nsfw or atleast a spoiler op.
thanks, please keep him in prayers
